history.proof: intros d pl tl H. induction H. - exists pl_path_nil. split. + apply pl_path_incl_nil. + apply pl_path_rec_nil. - destruct IHliste_reconnait as [plp [H1 H2]]. destruct H2. + hauto lq: on depth: 3use: pl_path_incl_cons, pl_path_rec_cons, pl_path_cons. + sfirstorder depth: 3use: pl_path_incl_cons, pl_path_rec_cons, pl_path_cons. - sauto lq: on depth: 3use: pl_path_incl_cons, pl_path_rec_cons, pl_path_cons.

original: intros d pl tl H. induction H. - exists pl_path_nil. split. + apply pl_path_incl_nil. + apply pl_path_rec_nil. - destruct IHliste_reconnait as [plp [H1 H2]]. destruct H2. exists (pl_path_cons a plp). split. + apply pl_path_incl_cons. apply H1. + apply pl_path_rec_cons with (a:=a). apply H. apply H0.
